name: Royal Rumble
description:
Ride the waves of your faithful servants in your crusade to overthrow the other king. Enjoy a 3D multiplayer Free-For-All experience with wacky physics and even wackier sound effects. (Featuring voice acting talent, Jared Thome!!) Requires 2 players and 2 controllers.

Made for Chillennium 2019 by:

Will Thomas Pierce: Design & Sound

Jared Thomas Thome: Art & Design

Aswin Anbarasan: Programming & Design
